detail_desc: Jacket in a soft weave containing some wool. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and zip down the front. Fixed yoke at the front, large patch front pockets with a flap, and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Sandals with glittery straps in woven fabric, an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening and soles that are fluted underneath.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Metal Alice band with fabric and imitation leather appliqués and a decoration in the shape of a unicorn horn.
Wide jumper in a soft, loose, fine knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Lace trim at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Wide, knee-length dress in a cotton weave with a large, frill-trimmed collar and narrow ties at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs and a gathered seam for added volume at the hem. Unlined.

Puffer jacket in a printed weave. Detachable, lined hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. The outer fabric and lining of the jacket are made from recycled polyester.

Turtleneck body in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Draping at the front, a concealed zip at the back and puff sleeves with gathers and concealed elastication at the shoulders. Lower section with laser-cut edges for a smooth silhouette, and press-studs at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in stretch, supersoft jersey that moulds to the body – one size fits all. High waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Sun hats in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Width of brim 5 cm. Lined.
Waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons down the front and fake pockets. Lined.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned slub cotton jersey with a double-layered top. Elastication and narrow shoulder straps with sewn-on bows at the top, press-studs at the crotch and short legs with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the hems.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with visible seams, a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves and side pockets. Asymmetric hem with a raw, roll edge. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with a pompom on the top, a ribbed, turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin.
Long dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and gathered seams at the waist and lower section of the skirt for added width. Lined.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Short, two-strand necklace in twisted metal chains, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 43–52 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with wide elastication, a small frill trim and wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Romper suit in a soft cable knit containing some wool with moss-knit sections and a stocking-stitch back. Buttons down the front and legs, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft jersey lining.
Fully lined cotton corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Full-length, straight-cut trousers in lace. Regular waist with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and legs with creases. Lined at the top.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High stand-up collar with a zip at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Sleeve pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals with a zip at the back and strap around the ankle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels approx. 8.5 cm.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Hair elastics without metal clips. Diameter 4.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Small handbag in sturdy grained imitation leather with a detachable shoulder strap, two handles, studs on the base and a tab decorated with a chunky metal chain that clips into a fastener on one long side. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Unlined. Size 10x22.5x32 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, slim legs and hard-worn details.

Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the armhole seams. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a low-cut skirt with gathers to create volume and soft draping.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Maxi dress in lace and jersey with cap sleeves and a boat-necked bodice in lace. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, an inset hem-stitched band at the waist and a skirt in heavily draping jersey with a sheen. Unlined apart from the lower section of the bodice which has a jersey lining.
Knee-length dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, side pockets and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.

Set with a sleeveless dress in woven fabric and a hairband. Dress with flower appliqués on the front, buttons at the back and a layered tulle skirt. Lined. Hairband in a double layer with flower appliqués at the front and covered elastic at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with asymmetric cut-outs at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Trenchcoat in a crêpe weave with wide notch lapels with a hook-and-eye fastener at the top, loose yoke with a pleat at the back, and a single back vent. Detachable tie belt at the waist, a decorative tab at the cuffs and diagonal welt pockets. Lined.

Dress in an airy patterned weave with an opening and button at the top and wide raglan sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides, and a flared, gently draping asymmetric skirt. Lined.
V-neck jumpsuit in soft jersey with short sleeves and a zip at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam at the waist. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with short raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Aqua shoes in patterned scuba fabric. Tab with a hook and loop fastening, a loop at the back and textured soles.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, wide rib knit with long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tunic in a lightly crêped weave with a small frilled collar, narrow ties at the top and sleeves with wide, flounced trims.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Sleeveless dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back, a glittery elasticated waistband and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
A pair of long metal chain earrings. Length 6.5 cm.
Twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 4 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with a frilled collar, buttons down the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long, oversized T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a small metal decoration on one shoulder.
Non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with space for breast prostheses. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned seersucker with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs that have adjustable buttoning. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with a seam at the hem. Sewn-in V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket trousers in grained imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, lower crotch and tapered legs with visible seams at the knees.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Straight-cut top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
